original_text: knowing it was out of self-interest that the chief priests had handed Jesus over to him.
korean_text: 이는 그가 대제사장들이 시기로 예수를 넘겨 준 줄 앎이러라

sentences.original_text: knowing it was out of self-interest
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 자기 이익 때문이라는 것을 알면서

sentences.original_text: that the chief priests had handed Jesus over
